name: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls – Friendship Games
summary:
My Little Pony: Equestria Girls – Friendship Games is the third movie in the My Little Pony: Equestria Girls line of films, itself a spin-off of the animated television show My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic. It is currently set for release in September 26, 2015.

The plot centers around the Canterlot High Wondercolts facing off against the Crystal Prep Shadowbolts in the eponymous Friendship Games, which include archery, motocross, and roller derby. Among the ranks of the Shadowbolts is the human incarnation of Twilight Sparkle, who was previously seen in The Stinger of Rainbow Rocks studying the magical goingson at Canterlot High. It's unknown whether Princess Twilight will appear and meet her human counterpart.
